Journal Story: Headed out after work to hike to Piazza Rock Lean To, this was a training hike / check out hike for hiking the Long Trail.  I hiked by myself and saw some south bounders.
Hiked over Saddleback Mountain, the Horn, Saddleback Junior to Popular Ridge lean-to.  Very beautiful, I chatted with T&R (Trees and Rocks) and other folks.

Last day of section hike, hike back to the parking lot and continue on to South Pond crossing Route 4.  I caught up with some SOBO section hikers, they had a zero at Rangley, later in September I would catch up with three SOBO's hikers on this trip on the Long Trail in Vermont.
Dave Fredriksson, John Haines and me hiked a Section in Northern Virginia

Hiked with Dave and John, the day was cold harsh rain, trails conditions were nice rolling hills with historic significance.  Very beautiful.  By the time we got to the Blackburn Trail Center we were cold, grateful for the hiker shelter with wood stove.  We warmed up, told stories and relaxed.
Nice day with Dave and John.  We cut the hike short, Julie our ride was coming back to get us earlier than we planned.  We were all grateful she came to get us.
